text: nāṁ malakkukaḷēāṭ paṟañña sandarbhaṁ: "niṅṅaḷ ādamin sāṣṭāṅgaṁ praṇamikkuka.” avar praṇamiccu; iblīs oḻike. avan jinnukaḷilpeṭṭavanāyirunnu. avan tanṟe nāthanṟe kalpana dhikkariccu. enniṭṭuṁ niṅṅaḷ enne veṭiññ avaneyuṁ avanṟe santatikaḷeyumāṇēā rakṣādhikārikaḷākkunnat? avar niṅṅaḷuṭe śatrukkaḷāṇ. atikramikaḷ allāhuvin pakaraṁ veccat vaḷare cīttatanne
